item.title: NIFT 2015 entrance for B.Des, M.Des, B.F.Tech, M.F.Tech, M.F.M admissions
item.description: National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT) will conduct its NIFT 2015 entrance exams for admission to its undergraduate and postgraduate programs in fashion and design for the year 2015-16 on 8 February & 22 February, 2015.

item.title: NID entrance exam (Design Aptitude Test - DAT 2015 for B.Des & M.Des) dates announced
item.description: DAT 2015 will be conducted on 10 and 11 January, 2015 for M.Des and B.Des programs respectively.

item.title: Apply online by 13 April for Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET 2014) for UG programs in Law, Design, Engineering, Health
item.description: The Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2014 is a written exam that evaluates candidates for admission to under graduate programs in law, design, engineering, health sciences at Symbiosis International University's (SIU) institutes.

item.title: Pearl Academy Admissions 2013 for Professional Diploma Courses in Fashion, Luxury, Interior Design
item.description: Pearl Academy for art, design and fashion invites applications for its diploma and professional diploma courses for the academic session 2013 to 2014.

item.title: DU College of Art Admissions 2013 - 14 in BFA, MFA
item.description: Admission to the University of Delhi's College of Art for BFA & MFA programs has opened. You must apply between 10 June and 22 June, 2013.
